#### Load the required libraries
```{r libraries, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
  library(R.utils)
  library(data.table)
  library(dplyr)
  library(lubridate)
  library(ggplot2)
```

#### Create the simultion
```{r simulation }
  rate=0.2
  n=40
  intervals=1000
  data = NULL
  for (i in 1 : intervals) data = c(data, mean(rexp(n,rate)))
  hist(data)
```
